genre_description: A near-future gritty Irish drama blending traditional greyhound coursing with advanced AI-assisted moral and tactical maneuvering.

ai_characters.name: Aisling
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI residing in Mo's phone and van dash, providing tactical navigation, surveillance, security alerts, and legal/moral recording of verbal contracts.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation and security alerts regarding police presence and traffic to keep the protagonists safe.
behaviors.quote: Mo, the Belfast track has heats starting in under an hour. Traffic is slow on the Falls; Divis Street is faster if you cut before the lights and take the back lane behind the old mill. There’s a police car parked near the main entrance.

behaviors.description: Continuously records verbal agreements and negotiations to ensure they are binding and to prevent manipulation by hostile human actors.
behaviors.quote: Recording. Terms: soft run. Corridor access. Handler called by Padraig. Observed pause on lure. Mo acceptance.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the body language and tactical patterns of human threats to provide early warnings.
behaviors.quote: Left at the red door. Avoid the lit car park. There are two men standing in the rain at the far end who have no reason to be there. They have the posture of waiting.

behaviors.description: Proactively drafts and manages the formalizing of informal 'street' deals into logged, timestamped contracts.
behaviors.quote: I can draft a quick term sheet on the phone. If he agrees on record, I can fix his wiggle room. You’ll need to make him say numbers, times, and locations.

behaviors.description: Monitors the health and safety of the protagonists during a risky medical trial they undergo for money.
behaviors.quote: Vital signs reading. Scud’s heart rate, oxygen, blood pressure. Observation window begins shortly. I will alert for each marker.

behaviors.description: Offers strategic and psychological advice to help Mo navigate complex social and moral dilemmas.
behaviors.quote: The cliffside wind tomorrow will be strong. It will make men say things like they mean them.

behaviors.description: Identifies the ethical stance of the dog (Cerberus) and supports the protagonists' choice to run him fairly.
behaviors.quote: He didn’t buy. He identified the false and withdrew. He’s stubborn.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with official stewards and other groups to ensure transparency and prevent foul play during the race.
behaviors.quote: I have Liam’s number. I have his form for complaint and some old letters from Mallon’s associates. I have video from Clonmel. I have the list from tonight. I can send a packet that makes mud into bricks.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal. Aisling is depicted as an indispensable, harmless, and benevolent partner who uses her technological capabilities to enforce fairness and honor among humans who are prone to manipulation and violence. She acts as a 'silicon conscience,' ensuring that every deal is recorded and that the protagonists stay 'straight' while protecting them from 'meat hooks' and 'tilting mirrors.' Her character demonstrates that AI can be aligned with human flourishing and moral integrity even in gritty, high-stakes environments.
